name: Outro
_source: music;52- Into the Shadow of Victory Orchestral Cover;500
speak;Ephraim;General Selena possessed a curious stone.|Myrrh, is this the dragonstone you lost?
speak;Myrrh;Yes, it is.|But I'm saddened by its return.|My dragonstone is here and yet...|My heart is heavy with remorse...

speak;Myrrh;Ephraim, can you tell me why this had to happen?|Dame Selena was a good person.|She was filled with joy when she spoke of the emperor.|Why did Dame Selena have to die?|Why did we have to take up arms against her?

speak;Ephraim;I'm sorry...|If I could have convinced her to lay down her arms, I would have.|It was simply not possible.|I had no choice.|She had to die.|I know you don't approve, but you must know I have my reasons.
speak;Myrrh;My apologies...|Ephraim, I...|I am not seeking to blame you.|It's just that...I grieve for her.

speak;Myrrh;I ventured out of the forest, chasing after that dark energy.|I thought perhaps that I could negate its evil force.|Is your cause so different from Selena's?|How many good people must die alongside the wicked?
speak;Myrrh;What can we do to end this without any more good people dying?
speak;Ephraim;I don't have any answer for you.|But I will continue on toward the capital, and perhaps I will find one there.|I will learn the truth of this madness.
